${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:AbyssSeal.NAME: Abyss Seal
${modID}:AbyssSeal.FLAVOR: The legendary Abyss Seal is a mysterious mark that manifests in battle as either the form of a Black Dragon or a White Dragon.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, randomly transform into #ydragonknight:Black_Dragon_Form or #ydragonknight:White_Dragon_Form.

${modID}:AbyssApostles.NAME: Abyssal Apostles
${modID}:AbyssApostles.FLAVOR: These Abyssal Apostle statues possess special powers, capable of duplicating and prolonging the effects of brands.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, add a copy of #b1 Attack with #yExhaust that was Exhausted by #ydragonknight:Brand into your hand next turn, reducing its [E] cost by #b1.

${modID}:BrandedCyclone.NAME: Brand Cyclone
${modID}:BrandedCyclone.FLAVOR: A mysterious cyclone surrounds the branded warrior, channeling its power every time a brand is used.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw 1 card the first time you use a #ydragonknight:Brand card each turn.

${modID}:AbyssDragon.NAME: Abyssal Dragon
${modID}:AbyssDragon.FLAVOR: The Abyssal Dragon is the evolved form of the Abyss Seal, capable of transforming into a powerful dragon shape.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yAbyss #ySeal. Choose to transform into a #yDragon #yForm at the start of each combat. At the start of each turn, if at least 4 cards were exhausted by #ydragonknight:Brand last turn, randomly transform into a #yDragon #yForm.

${modID}:BrandFate.NAME: Brand Fate
${modID}:BrandFate.FLAVOR: Brand Fate is a mysterious force that can alter the destiny of cards.
DESCRIPTIONS: When resting at a campfire, you can choose a card to apply #ydragonknight:Anti-Brand.

${modID}:BrandsCall.NAME: Brand's Call
${modID}:BrandsCall.FLAVOR: The Brand's Call accelerates the warrior's acquisition of brands.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, draw an extra #b1 #ydragonknight:Brand card. The first #ydragonknight:Brand card used each turn reduces its [E] cost by #b1.

${modID}:KingsInsight.NAME: King's Insight
${modID}:KingsInsight.FLAVOR: The King's Insight allows the warrior to quickly understand and master new powers.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a #yStatus card, Exhaust it.

${modID}:IceDevilsHeart.NAME: Ice Devil's Heart
${modID}:IceDevilsHeart.FLAVOR: The Ice Devil's Heart is a precious gem infused with the power of cold, bestowing the warrior with mighty ice abilities.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yAbyss #ySeal. At the start of each turn, draw an extra #b1 #ydragonknight:Anti-Brand card. The first #b1 #ydragonknight:Anti-Brand card used each turn reduces its [E] cost by #b1. At the start of each turn, gain [E] [E] , and draw an extra #b2 cards. You will no longer trigger #ydragonknight:Brand.

${modID}:DivineFlameRing.NAME: Divine Flame Ring
${modID}:DivineFlameRing.FLAVOR: The Divine Flame Ring can absorb the power of enemy statuses, providing the warrior with additional energy and strength.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a power to an enemy, gain [E] and #b1 temporary #yStrength.

${modID}:CopyPaper.NAME: Copy Paper
${modID}:CopyPaper.FLAVOR: Seemingly a mysterious item from another dimension.
DESCRIPTIONS: After each turn, choose #b1 card to return to the draw pile and randomly draw #b1 #ydragonknight:Brand card.

${modID}:HeavenlyFate.NAME: Heavenly Fate
DESCRIPTIONS: After each turn, choose #b1 Attack in your hand to grant #yExhaust and #yEthereal.

${modID}:AbyssalSpectator.NAME: Abyssal Spectator
${modID}:AbyssalSpectator.FLAVOR: The Abyssal Spectators are mysterious entities whose appearance can bring forth the descent of the Black Dragon.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you use a #ydragonknight:Anti-Brand card each turn, randomly draw #b1 Power. If this Power is used during this turn, enter #ydragonknight:Black_Dragon_Form.
